ExampleDefinition.Description:
The 3D Realtime Ellipsoid Mesh example shows how to update a [url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']EllipsoidDataSeries3D[/url] in real-time to render to a 3D [url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D[/url].
The Free Surface Mesh colors and palette can be udpated by supplying a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.MeshColorPalette.html']MeshColorPalette[/url], which wraps a LinearGradientBrush.
Many mesh options are available such as Wireframe, SolidMesh, Solid with Wireframe, and many paletting options such as Solid Cells, Interpolated Cells and Textured.
[b]Change some of the options on the left-hand side to see what this versatile chart type is capable of doing.[/b]
